methods.name: create
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Places: Create a Place for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the places property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: query
methods.summary: Retrieve a list of places with sorting and pagination.
methods.description:

Data is returned in the places property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: remove
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Places: Delete a Place for the request parameters supported by this method.

Only the user who created the place can delete it.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
